entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: june
entities.description: A month mentioned in the text as the time when Harry's nerves are mounting.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather, who sends him a good-luck card through a post owl.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and classmates at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry's nerves are mounting as June 24th draws closer, indicating a relationship between Harry and the date.
Sirius sends Harry a good-luck card through a post owl, indicating a relationship between Sirius and Harry.
Hermione receives her morning copy of the Daily Prophet, indicating a relationship between Hermione and the newspaper.
